words.ex: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.
She suspected an ulterior motive behind his generosity.
He took umbrage at the insinuation.
She remained unabashed despite the criticism.
The news brought him unalloyed joy.
Her unassuming manner concealed remarkable talent.
The crowd erupted in unbridled enthusiasm.
He had an uncanny ability to predict outcomes.
His unctuous compliments made everyone uncomfortable.
The constant delays undermined confidence in the project.
She gave an unequivocal answer that ended the debate.
The scale of the universe remains unfathomable.
The tall teenager moved with an ungainly gait.
The company made a unilateral decision without consultation.
Her unimpeachable integrity earned universal respect.
They danced with uninhibited joy.
The audio recording was nearly unintelligible.
His unorthodox methods produced impressive results.
The crisis led to unprecedented cooperation between rivals.
Investigators worked to unravel the complex scheme.
Their unrelenting efforts finally paid off.
Remarkably, they emerged from the accident unscathed.
Unscrupulous dealers exploited the lack of regulation.
His unseemly remarks shocked the audience.
The hypothesis became untenable after new data emerged.
Nothing untoward occurred during the event.
The unwieldy equipment slowed the team down.
He became an unwitting participant in the scheme.
She upbraided him for missing the deadline.
His urbane charm impressed the international guests.
